ProductName: Avene Cicalfate+ Restorative Protective Cream 100ml - Multi-purpose Repair cream
ProductDescription: Avène Cicalfate+ Restorative Protective Cream helps repair damaged, dry, cracked, and non-oozing skin in 48 hours*. Skin is immediately soothed after the first application**, and the cutaneous barrier is restored. Can be used after minor dermatological procedures as well as cuts, blisters, skin irritations, mild burns and nappy rash.  Avène Cicalfate+ Restorative Protective Cream helps repair damaged, dry, cracked, and non-oozing skin in 48 hours*. Skin is immediately soothed after the first application**, and the cutaneous barrier is restored. Can be used after minor dermatological procedures as well as cuts, blisters, skin irritations, mild burns and nappy rash. Properties: - Innovative postbiotic repairing ingredient C+ Restore, derived from pro-biotic Avène Thermal Spring Water. ProductName: Avene Micellar Lotion 500ml - Micellar water for Senstive skin
ProductDescription: Avène Micellar Lotion is an 'all in one' no rinse lotion. It cleanses, removes makeup and impurities and tones the skin.  Avène Micellar Lotion is a 3-in-1 non-rinse lotion. It cleanses, removes makeup and impurities and tones the skin. The non-greasy, refreshing formula offers the anti-irritating and soothing benefits of Avène Thermal Spring Water and the moisturising properties of sodium hyaluronate. It leaves skin feeling soft and fresh.Micellar Lotion has been specifically formulated for the cleansing and makeup removal of sensitive skin.Properties:- Formulated with extra-gentle cleansing ingredients, it will delicately eliminate impurities and carefully remove makeup from face, eyes and lips while respecting the skin's natural balance- With its unique clear and light formula and enriched with softening ingredients, Avène Micellar Lotion leaves the skin feeling comfortable, soft and supple.Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic and paraben free. Apply the Micellar Lotion morning and/or evening to the face and neck with a cotton pad. Follow with a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water over your face. The confidence of healthy skin Suitable For:  Adults Product Claims:  Formulated with extra-gentle cleansing ingredients, it will delicately eliminate impurities and carefully remove makeup from face, eyes and lips while respecting the skin's natural balance Size:  500ml Dermatologist Recommended?:  Yes Skin Type:  Sensitive KEY FEATURES  • •  CLEANSES and removes even particle pollution.

ProductName: Avene Hydrance Light Hydrating Emulsion 40ml - Moisturiser for dehydrated skin
ProductDescription:
A daily moisturiser that provides intense and immediate long-lasting hydration, thanks to the combination of water transporting microspheres and CohedermTM complex. This complex contains a trio of lipids which:-	Restores the skin's natural hydration barrier-	Improves cohesion between the epidermal cells-	Refills the natural water reservoirs with a high concentration of Avène Thermal Spring WaterThis innovative complex is captured inside water-transporting microspheres which allow actives to be gradually released over time for long-lasting hydration*.  Avène Hydrance Light Hydrating Emulsion is a daily moisturiser that intensely hydrates and nourishes the skin, thanks to the combination of water transporting microspheres and CohedermTM complex. This complex contains a trio of lipids which:
-	Restores the skin's natural hydration barrier
-	Improves cohesion between the epidermal cells
-	Refills the natural water reservoirs with a high concentration of Avène Thermal Spring Water.

This innovative complex is captured inside water-transporting microspheres which allow actives to be gradually released over time for long-lasting hydration*.
This Light Hydrating Emulsion has an aqua-film texture; soft and silky on the skin. Tightness and tingling sensations are alleviated leaving skin soft, supple and luminous. 
Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic and paraben free. Apply morning and/or night to the face, neck and décolleté, following Hydrance Intense Rehydrating Serum.
*Measurement of the Hydration Index on 22 subjects with dehydrated skin, after 1 application on the forearm (+38% hydration after 1 hour) The confidence of healthy skin Suitable For:  Adults Product Claims:  Provides mmediate and intense long-lasting hydration* Size:  40ml Scent:  Soft and light Dermatologist Recommended?:  Yes Skin Type:  Combination KEY FEATURES  • •  RESTORES the skin's natural hydration barrier • •  IMPROVES cohesion between the epidermal cells • •  REFILLS the natural water reservoirs with a high concentration of Avène Thermal Spring Water • •  Very rich in our Thermal Spring Water for its soothing and properties • •  CohedermTM complex restores the skin's natural hydration barrier and refills the natural water reservoirs with a high concentration of Avène Thermal Spring Water • •  Microsphere technology allows actives to be gradually released over time for long-lasting hydration* • •  Immediate and intense long-lasting hydration*, relief from tightness and tingling, skin feels soft, supple and luminous • •  Fine lines caused by dehydration are smoothed**

POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE. POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSPHATE. ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER. BENZOIC ACID. C12-20 ALKYL GLUCOSIDE. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). ProductName: Avène A-Oxitive DAY Smoothing Water-cream 30ml - Vitamin C Moisturiser
ProductDescription: Avène A-Oxitive Smoothing Water-cream helps to fight against the harmful effects of daily aggressors (blue light from digital screens, pollution, free radicals, stress) and preserve youthful skin, thanks to a unique combination of key ingredients.  Avène A-Oxitive Smoothing Water-cream helps to fight against the harmful effects of daily aggressors (blue light from digital screens, pollution, free radicals, stress) and preserve youthful skin, thanks to a unique combination of key ingredients:•  Gradual Release Vitamin C (Ascorbyl Glucoside): innovative ingredient which gradually releases pure Vitamin C throughout the day to brighten and smooth skin's texture. Excellent tolerance on sensitive skin, stable under light and provides long-lasting antioxidant protection. •  Gradual Release Vitamin E (Pre-tocopheryl): fights against free radicals, powerful antioxidant•  Hyaluronic Acid: intense hydration, smoothing•  Copper and purple pigments to readjust skin's balance of light and colourA true hydration booster, the water-cream delicately melts onto the skin to protect, hydrate and create a healthy glow and brighter complexion. Its light water-cream texture is refreshing and silky on the skin. Fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced, the complexion is radiant and refreshed. Skin texture is more even, and pores are visibly reduced. Apply in the morning and/or evening, after serum, to the face, neck and décolleté. Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic and paraben free. The confidence of healthy skin Suitable For:  Adults Product Claims:  Gradual Release Vitamin C Size:  30ml Scent:  Fresh and delicate fragrance Dermatologist Recommended?:  Yes Skin Type:  Sensitive KEY FEATURES  • •  ANTIOXIDANT: protects against pollution. • •  SMOOTHS wrinkles and fine lines. • •  ILLUMINATES thanks to complexion-illuminating pearls. • •  Rich in our Thermal Spring Water for its soothing and anti-irritating properties • •  Light water-cream texture, refreshing and silky on the skin • •  Skin is protected, hydrated and glowing • •  Protects against external aggressors including free radicals, antioxidant properties • •  CLINICALLY PROVEN 24H hydration**

ProductName: Avene Cleanance Starter Kit - For Oily skin
ProductDescription: Avène Cleanance Acne Fighting Starter Kit contains:- Avène Cleanance Cleansing Gel 100mlCleanance soap free Cleansing Gel gently removes impurities from the skin and helps reduce excess sebum without drying out the skin. Thanks to the key ingredient Comedoclastin™, it leaves the skin clean, clear and refreshed.- 2 x Avène Cleanance Comedomed 5mlAvène Cleanance Comedomed is a moisturising anti-blemish concentrate with clinically proven results from 7 days*.Formulated with Key Ingredient Innovation: Comedoclastin™ 25%, this concentrate effectively reduces existing and future breakouts by restoring balance to the skin and regulating the hyperproduction of sebum, for long-lasting efficacy.Acne-fighting, anti-blemish, anti-recurrence. *Clinical assessment by dermatologist conducted on 51 subjects - Comedomed applied twice daily.  Avène Cleanance Cleansing GelAvène Cleanance Cleansing Gel deeply cleanses to remove impurities which block pores (dust, pollution etc.) and reduces excess sebum, without drying out the skin. This soap free cleanser purifies the skin, gently removes makeup, can be used on backne, and can be used as a shaving gel for men with oily skin. Clinically proven to reduce blemishes and blackheads, this biodegradable formula leaves the skin clean, clear and mattified.Avène Cleanance ComedomedEau Thermale Avène Cleanance Comedomed is a highly concentrated, fast-acting formula providing long-lasting clinical benefits, and has a targeted dual action:1.	Effectively reduces and limits the reappearance of blemishes and blackheads 2.	Regulates the hyperproduction of sebumThe minimalist formula, including exclusive ComedoclastinTM, a plant-based active ingredient made from milk thistle oil, works to reduce blemishes and blackheads, and limit their reappearance by restoring the balance of the skin.An ultra-light, non-greasy fluid, it's quickly absorbed, and specifically adapted for the needs of oily sensitive skin. Excess sebum is controlled for a matte finish. Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic, paraben free and fragrance free. Apply to the face morning and evening after using a Cleanance cleanser. Can be used alone or in combination with medicinal acne treatments (should not be used with oral isotretinoin). Suitable for adults and adolescents.The products odour is related to its innovative ingredient and will quickly disappear. Good skin tolerance. Avoid contact with eyes. ProductDescription: Avène DermAbsolu Recontouring Mask restores firmness, hydrates and illuminates the skin.Expertly formulated with a unique combination of high-performance key ingredients, this luxurious mask helps the skin to soften the signs of ageing:- ProVitamin C: helps boost collagen production and restore radiance- Niacinamide: skin texture is even, bright and smooth- SytenolTM: a natural alternative to retinol that helps protect against collagen depletion- Glycoleol: Essential skin lipid precursor, intensely nourishes and mimics the skinThis complimentary care combination provides unprecedented benefits, firming and restoring comfort to the skin.  Avène DermAbsolu Recontouring Mask restores firmness, hydrates and illuminates the skin.Expertly formulated with a unique combination of high-performance key ingredients, this luxurious mask helps the skin to soften the signs of ageing:- ProVitamin C: helps boost collagen production and restore radiance- Niacinamide: skin texture is even, bright and smooth- SytenolTM: a natural alternative to retinol that helps protect against collagen depletion- Glycoleol: Essential skin lipid precursor, intensely nourishes and mimics the skinThis complimentary care combination provides unprecedented benefits, firming and restoring comfort to the skin.Our hero ingredient, SytenolTM is a patented form of "Bakuchiol", the first natural effective alternative to retinol. Hailed as an antiageing hero in skincare, Bakuchiol is extracted from the leaves of the Babchi plant (Psoralea corylifolia) and has been long used traditionally in Ayurvedic & Chinese medicine for its soothing and calming properties. Bakuchiol is photostable meaning that it can be used during the day and is well tolerated and gentle on sensitive skin.This transformative anti-ageing cocooning mask provides results you can see and feel from the first use. From just 10 mins, skin is luminous, nourished* and intensely moisturised for up to 8 hours**.*Consumer Use test after the recommended 10 minutes of exposure, on 74 subjects for 1 hour, in a single application. Results vary depending on application amount.**Evaluation of the moisturising effect immediately after application over 24hours compared to one commercial reference and an untreated control area after single application on 19 subjects. 56 days. The confidence of healthy skin Suitable For:  Adults Product Claims:  91% of ingredients of natural origin. Size:  75ml Dermatologist Recommended?:  Yes KEY FEATURES  • •  TONES and repairs the skin to enhance the facial contour. • •  REVIVES radiance for luminous skin. • •  PLUMPS and intensely hydrates the skin.

ProductName: Avene A-Oxitive NIGHT Peeling Cream 30ml - Vitamin A moisturiser
ProductDescription:
Avène A-Oxitive Night Peeling Cream works through the night to boost cellular activity, detoxify and even out skin texture, preserving youthful skin thanks to a night renewing complex of active ingredients.  Avène A-Oxitive Night Peeling Cream works through the night to boost cellular activity, detoxify and even out skin texture, preserving youthful skin thanks to a night renewing complex of active ingredients:
-	Gradual Release Vitamin A (Retinaldehyde): boosts cellular activity, refines the skin's texture and evens the skin tone. Reduces fine lines and wrinkles. 
-	Gradual Release Vitamin E (Pre-tocopheryl): fights against free radicals, powerful antioxidant
-	Evening primrose oil: sourced from the small seeds of the plant, commonly known as "evening star", whose flowers open only at dusk, rich in fatty acids and vitamins, helps nourish the skin and restore its balance
With powerful antioxidant properties, skin is protected against external aggressors including free radicals, revealing a visibly smoother, toned and more radiant complexion. Its fluid, creamy texture glides gently onto the skin, absorbing quickly for a non-greasy, velvety finish. By morning, fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced, skin texture is visibly refined, and pores are tightened.
Equivalent to 3 peel sessions*

Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic, paraben free and fragrance free. Apply in the evening, after serum, to the face, neck and décolleté.
Not suitable for use while pregnant or breastfeeding. Avoid sun exposure and apply sunscreen daily.

*Comparative clinical study under dermatological control - 56 subjects - 1 application of A-Oxitive Peeling cream every evening for 8 weeks vs 3 Glycolic acid peel sessions (20%/50%/70%). The confidence of healthy skin Suitable For:  Adults Product Claims:  Gradual release Vitamin A Size:  30ml Scent:  Fragrance-free Fragrance Free?:  Yes Dermatologist Recommended?:  Yes KEY FEATURES  • • 	Rich in our Thermal Spring Water for its soothing and softening properties • • 	Fluid, creamy texture, velvety finish, absorbs quickly into the skin • • 	Skin texture is visibly smoother, more even and radiance restored • • 	Protects against external aggressors including free radicals, antioxidant properties • • 	Very good skin and ocular tolerance • • 	Airless packaging protects the formula from oxidation, leaving Retinaldehyde in its key form and its efficacy optimised • • 	Paraben free, fragrance free • • 	Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic

ProductName: Avene Cleanance Cleansing Gel 200ml - Cleanser for Oily skin
ProductDescription:
Avène Cleanance Cleansing Gel deeply cleanses to remove impurities which block pores (dust, pollution etc.) and reduces excess sebum, without drying out the skin.  Avène Cleanance Cleansing Gel deeply cleanses to remove impurities which block pores (dust, pollution etc.) and reduces excess sebum, without drying out the skin. 
This soap free cleanser purifies the skin, gently removes makeup, can be used on backne, and can be used as a shaving gel for men with oily skin. Clinically proven to reduce blemishes and blackheads, this biodegradable formula leaves the skin clean, clear and mattified.

Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic, soap free and paraben free. Apply morning and/or evening to wet skin, work up lather, rinse thoroughly then pat dry. If needed, finish with a light mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water, gently pat dry and apply suitable skin care products. ProductName: Avene Soothing Radiance Mask 50ml - Mask for Dry Sensitive skin
ProductDescription: Avène Soothing Radiance Mask helps restore the natural beauty of even the most sensitive skin. A genuine Avène Thermal Spring Water home treatment to intensely nourish, hydrate and strengthen the skin barrier.  Avène Soothing Radiance Mask helps restore the natural beauty of even the most sensitive skin. A genuine Avène Thermal Spring Water home treatment to intensely nourish, hydrate and strengthen the skin barrier. The new antioxidant Natural Berry Extract instantly delivers lipids to rebuild and strengthen the skin barrier so it's able to maintain effective hydration and restore skin's natural balance. The skin is protected against external aggressors including free radicals, thanks to the antioxidant properties of Natural Berry Extract combined with Pre-tocopheryl, a Vitamin E precursor. Formulated with ingredients of plant origin and enhanced with Avène Thermal Spring Water, skin is deeply moisturised, radiant and signs of fatigue fade for a healthy, glowing complexion. The cocoon-like texture is rich in Avène Thermal Spring Water and hydro-nourishing active ingredients to soothe and repair the skin barrier during your weekly pampering. Tired skin is refreshed, radiant and intensely replenished. Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic and paraben free. Apply in a thick layer to the face and neck. Leave on for 10 to 15 minutes. Gently remove excess product with a cotton pad. No rinse needed. Finish by spraying a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water.
